topic.title: How to Change the Publication Title Using a Parameter

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse
author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: In the following example, a custom parameter is used as the publication main title. The parameter is defined in the transformation scenario as:args.css.param.main-title="${ask('Main title', generic, 'Flowers')}"When running the scenario, a dialog will appear prompting for a title, with 'Flowers' set as the default.
